title: laptop doubt
content: Guys,I have a Lenovo laptop which has become slow now and has keyboard issues,So should I buy it now only or Can I buy it in the 2nd year.When do we actually require a laptop for coding.

comments.body:
If your laptop can: 

1. Open PDFs/PPTs and you can scroll through them

2. Run a couple of Python/C programs

You can use it in first year.
